comment.shortText:
Generate a buffer by rendering all of the Tone.js code within the callback using the OfflineAudioContext.
The OfflineAudioContext is capable of rendering much faster than real time in many cases.
The callback function also passes in an offline instance of [[Context]] which can be used
to schedule events along the Transport.
comment.returns: The promise which is invoked with the ToneAudioBuffer of the recorded output.

comment.text: All Tone.js nodes which are created and scheduled within this callback are recorded into the output Buffer.
the amount of time to record for.
